H0.text: who is covering the winter olympics in canada. CBC

H1.text: who is covering the winter olympics in canada. Sportsnet

H2.text: who is covering the winter olympics in canada. TSN

H3.text: who is covering the winter olympics in canada. TLN

A4.text: CBC reached a deal of its own in August 2012, winning the rights to the 2014 and 2016 Games.

A5.text: On February 7, 2013, CBC announced that it had reached deals with Sportsnet and TSN for both networks to become their official cable partners, beginning at the 2014 Winter Olympics.

A6.text: The Sports Network, a Canadian English-language cable television specialty channel

A7.text: Tyson Foods has the NYSE ticker TSN.

A8.text: Tianjin Binhai International Airport has the IATA code TSN.

A9.text: The CRTC rejected its proposal to spend its tangible benefits on the Sportsnet Winter Games.
